计软智网转专业试题回忆版、模拟题及参考解答
  • 网安 2022 年模拟题
  • 1. 阅读程序题
  • 1. 对象的生命周期/存储周期（带输出的构造与析构）
  • 2. 静态生命周期（static lifetime）

2. 静态生命周期（static lifetime）

说明

此处专指静态局部变量.

运行到它的名字时开始, 程序结束时 结束, 因此即使多次运行到, 也只会构造一次. 它的析构晚于自动生命周期对象.

 1void function() {
 2  static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "0", .dtor = "1"}};
 3  Printer c2{Info{.ctor = "2", .dtor = "3"}};
 4}
 5
 6auto main() -> int {
 7  function();
 8  function();
 9}
10// 最终输出
11// 0: c1 构造
12// 2: 第一次调用时, c2 构造
13// 3: 第一次调用时, c2 析构
14// 2: 第二次调用时, c2 构造
15// 3: 第二次调用时, c2 析构
16// 1: c1 析构

对象的生命周期按它开始的相反顺序结束.

1auto main() -> int {
2  { static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "0", .dtor = "1"}}; }
3  static Printer c2{Info{.ctor = "2", .dtor = "3"}};
4}
5// 最终输出
6// 0: c1 构造
7// 2: c2 构造
8// 3: c2 析构
9// 1: c1 析构

函数模板实例化后可能是不同的函数, 则有不同的静态局部变量.

 1template <typename T>
 2void function() {
 3  static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "0", .dtor = "1"}};
 4}
 5
 6auto main() -> int {
 7  function<int>();
 8  function<double>();
 9  function<int>();
10}
11// 最终输出
12// 0: function<int>::c1 构造
13// 0: function<double>::c1 构造
14// 1: function<double>::c1 析构
15// 1: function<int>::c1 析构

题目

题 1

1auto main() -> int {
2  static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "v", .dtor = "r"}};
3  { static Printer c2{Info{.ctor = "e", .dtor = "o"}}; }
4  static Printer c3{Info{.ctor = "c", .dtor = "t"}};
5}

点击查看提示

6 个字符, 标准库中可变长度的数组.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 ssPdneKo4], 答案: vector.

题 2

 1void function(Printer const& printer) { static Printer c1 = printer; }
 2
 3auto main() -> int {
 4  static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "d", .copy_ctor = "m", .dtor = "r"}};
 5
 6  {
 7    static Printer c2{Info{.ctor = "o", .copy_ctor = "l", .dtor = "o"}};
 8    function(c1);
 9    { static Printer c3{Info{.ctor = "a", .dtor = "r"}}; }
10    static Printer c4{Info{.ctor = "i", .dtor = "e"}};
11    function(c2);
12  }
13
14  static Printer c6{Info{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "_"}};
15}

点击查看提示

12 个字符, 输入参数超出函数的定义域时抛出的异常.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 xc19YrYTY], 答案: domain_error.

题 3

 1auto main() -> int {
 2  {
 3    { static Printer c1{Info{.ctor = "f", .dtor = "f"}}; }
 4    static Printer c2{Info{.ctor = "i", .dtor = "o"}};
 5  }
 6  {
 7    { static Printer c3{Info{.ctor = "n", .dtor = "_"}}; }
 8
 9    static Printer c4{Info{.ctor = "d", .dtor = "t"}};
10    {
11      static Printer c5{Info{.ctor = "_", .dtor = "o"}};
12      { static Printer c6{Info{.ctor = "l", .dtor = "n"}}; }
13      static Printer c7{Info{.ctor = "a", .dtor = "_"}};
14    }
15    static Printer c8{Info{.ctor = "s", .dtor = "t"}};
16  }
17}

点击查看提示

16 个字符, 在 std::string 中查找最后一个不等于给定字符序列中任何字符的字符.

点击查看答案

[在线代码 67Kjb5c6s], 答案: find_last_not_of.
